# brave export

Export bravetools image from local image store as LXD tarball

```
brave export <image> [<image>...]
```

## Description

Export bravetools image from local image store as LXD tarball

## Options

```
  -h, --help         help for export
  -o, --out string   Directory to export images to [OPTIONAL]
```
